backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing storage, access control, user profiles, contacts, clients, transporters, loads, and APK link management with admin‑restricted mutations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to affected files, components, and test IDs for admin routing and error‑handling improvements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of concise summaries for all frontend source files describing their purpose and behavior.
frontend/.gitignore: Ignore rules for node modules, build outputs, IDE files, Capacitor artifacts, and Android/iOS build directories.
frontend/ADMIN_ACCESS.md: Documentation explaining the admin route access gate, related components, authentication flow, and support contact.
frontend/ANDROID_BUILD.md: Guide for building Android APK/AAB files and preparing them for Play Store publishing.
frontend/capacitor.config.ts: Capacitor configuration specifying app metadata, web directory, HTTPS Android scheme, and keystore‑based Android build options.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme definitions with light and dark OKLCH color variables and global styling rules.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point defining the root container and loading the main React script.
frontend/scripts/android/_signing-env.ex: Template for Android signing environment variables including keystore paths and passwords.
frontend/scripts/android/build-debug-apk: Builds a debug Android APK by checking prerequisites, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle assembleDebug.
frontend/scripts/android/build-release-a: Builds a signed release AAB for Play Store by verifying signing env vars, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle bundleRelease.
Builds a signed release APK for distribution by checking signing env vars, building the web app, syncing Capacitor, and running Gradle assembleRelease.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, React Query client, theme provider, and toast system, rendering the main application structure.
frontend/src/components/ads/AdSnippetPre: Renders an iframe preview of an ad snippet with error handling and diagnostics overlay for failed loads.
frontend/src/components/ads/BottomAd.tsx: Displays a dismissible bottom ad using stored ad settings and an iframe preview, updating dynamically on settings changes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Shows an access denied message with support contact info and a button to return home.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteE: Error boundary wrapping admin routes, showing a recovery UI when errors occur and allowing retry.
Displays admin access errors with retry and sign‑out options, along with troubleshooting guidance.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminSignIn: Prompts unauthorized users to sign in for admin access and redirects them post-login.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles login/logout via Internet Identity with loading states, error handling, and optional success callback.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal form that collects name and email and saves a new user profile via useSaveUserProfile.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Wrapper that checks authentication and admin role, showing loading, error, sign-in, or access-denied states before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer displaying company info, links, coverage areas, and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Page layout with top navigation, main content area, bottom ad, and footer.
frontend/src/components/layout/TopNav.ts: Responsive navigation bar with desktop and mobile menus plus login button integration.
frontend/src/components/loads/LoadLocati: Displays pickup and drop-off locations with icons if provided and not marked unknown.
frontend/src/config/ads.ts: Defines ad configuration, default AdSense snippet, and helpers to load and save bottom ad settings from localStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Aggregates identity, user profile, and role queries to determine authentication state, loading state, and admin access.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, handling login state, stored identities, and auth client setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data including contacts, clients, transporters, loads, and APK links.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserProfile.ts: Defines React Query hooks for retrieving and saving the current user's profile and role using the actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining color variables, themes, and base utility styles for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders a static About page describing the company, mission, values, and regional coverage.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Implements the admin dashboard with load approvals, transporter and client management, contact messages, APK link updates, ads, and CSV export.
frontend/src/pages/ClientRegistrationPag: Provides a client registration and profile update form integrated with authentication and backend save/query hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form that submits user inquiries via a mutation hook and displays static contact info.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the homepage with hero content, calls to action, company overview, and testimonials.
frontend/src/pages/LoadBoardPage.tsx: Provides load browsing, posting, and user-specific load views with file uploads and validation.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Shows a list of service offerings and a brief how‑it‑works section for the platform.
frontend/src/pages/TransporterRegistrati: Implements transporter registration with document uploads, validation, and profile editing.
frontend/src/routeTree.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure using TanStack Router and maps routes to pages.
frontend/src/utils/csv.ts: Converts an array of objects to CSV format and triggers a browser download.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routes), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, typography, animations, and container settings with custom plugins.
project_state.json: JSON snapshot of project requirements, architectural notes, known issues, and existing feature definitions for build planning.
